overview: Michael Brandon presents the new 2-disc Trouser Trout with action as hot as ever and a group of hot men unmatched in porn history. The Trouser Trout cast is full of huge dicks and each man is anxious to catch the big one. A group of 9 strapping men meet up at the Russian River Resort for a drink before they begin their annual fishing trip. title: Trouser Trout
